subs.text: @GoogleWorkspace In a blog post about Smart Canvas was the mention of Topic-Voting Table Templates. Was this ever rolled out and if so how do you create them? [link]

subs.text: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.
subs.rawText: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.

subs.text: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies.  The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.
subs.rawText: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies.  The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.
